formatDescription: This format contains the raw data produced by Bruker X-ray Powder Diffraction (XRD) Instrumentation. Please contact the PRONOM team if you are able to provide a more detailed description.
provenanceCompoundName: University of Edinburgh / University of Edinburgh

internalSignatures.name: DIFFRACplus Raw Data File Format 1
internalSignatures.note: BOF: "RAW1.00", 0x00 {8} MM/DD/YY. Signnature based on the format description in the Bruker Advanced X-Ray Solutions General Area Detector Diffraction System (GADDS) Reference Manual. Also see https://github.com/scattering/scattio/blob/master/python/scattio/bruker.py
